title: Insurance CSR
job_overview:
ATTENTION: US Insurance Experience Required!***

We are currently seeking a dedicated individual with prior insurance industry experience (Commercial/Personal Lines) to join our team and provide support to US-based insurance agencies.

The role involves:
-Handling clerical tasks
-Assisting with quoting policies
-Managing billing activities
-Delivering exceptional customer service

Requirements:
-Fluency in English (written and spoken)
-Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively
-Previous customer service experience
-Experience speaking with clients

If you meet these qualifications, please share a link to your resume/CV file
